argument.description: The number to test for its sign.

description: The PostgreSQL sign function returns a value indicating the sign of a number.
sample:
postgres=# SELECT sign(12);
 sign
------
    1
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT sign(0);
 sign
------
    0
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT sign(-12);
 sign
------
   -1
(1 row)
